Name: Prohibiting outside employment for council members.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York City charter, in relation to prohibiting outside employment for council members.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Governmental Operations
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
	Section 1. Section 23 of the New York City charter is REPEALED and a new section 23 is added to read as follows:  
	§23.  Council members not to hold other employment.   Members of the council shall not engage in paid outside employment or other forms of activity for which they receive payment for their professional services.
	§2.  This local law shall take effect on January 1, 2010 and shall apply to all council members on and after such date.
